duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide emergency medical care and transportation for patients.
Lead a team of paramedics, providing guidance and support in emergency response efforts.
Administer medical treatment and perform life-saving interventions as required.
Maintain clear and effective communication with healthcare teams and patients.
Organize and prioritize patient care activities in high-pressure environments.
Document patient information and treatment provided for accurate medical records.

education_certification.credential: Associate or Bachelor's degree in Paramedicine or related field
